pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
On the margins of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) Leaders' Meeting, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met with Jens Stoltenberg, NATO's Secretary General. 

The two leaders discussed issues related to Euro-Atlantic security, including burden sharing and NATO's role in counter-terrorism.

The Secretary General thanked Canada for its concrete contributions to the Alliance, including in addressing the issue of sexual and gender-based violence in armed conflict and in leading a multinational battlegroup deploying to Latvia as part of NATO's enhance Forward Presence.
